Title: Fiesta del Chopo (Poplar Tree Festival)
Description: Experience the San Juan Bautista Festival in Cortelazor June 20-22. Join the Celtic tradition of the Chopo Festival, special gastronomy and blues rock concert. A unique celebration!
Keywords: San Juan Bautista Festival Cortelazor, Chopo Festival, Celtic tradition, summer solstice, patron saint festivals Huelva, Mesón El Maño, Mesón El Matadero, EX3 concert, rural tourism Andalusia, Spanish traditions, Cortelazor la Real, Sierra de Aracena
